description: This file defines an API route for listing resources using FastAPI. It includes an endpoint that supports optional filters and pagination, calling a service to retrieve resource data and returning a structured response.

classes.name: ResourceListResponse
classes.description: Response schema for a paginated list of resources.

classes.name: ResourceOut
classes.description: Schema representing a single resource output.

methods.name: ResourceListResponse list_resources_endpoint( provider: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by provider (aws|azure|gcp)"), region: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by region (e.g., us-east-1)"), state: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by state"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number (1-based)"), size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Page size"), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a list of resources with optional filters and pagination.

calls: svc_list_resources(session, provider=provider, region=region, state=state, page=page, size=size)

ctags.name: list_resources_endpoint
ctags.signature: ( provider: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by provider (aws|azure|gcp)"), region: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by region (e.g., us-east-1)"), state: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by state"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number (1-based)"), size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Page size"), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )
